LanguageData.AS_WAE_NobleCoat.label: Noble Coat (Ancient Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WAE_NobleCoat.description: A combat coat worn by the ancient elf nobility. Not only is it extremely durable, but it also amplifies the wearer's combat ability.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ElvenMantle.label: Elven Cloak (Half-Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ElvenMantle.description: A cloak made with ancient elf technology. It has an elegant design with gold patterns woven into it. Made of extremely durable material, it has excellent cold, heat, heat, and defensive performance, and is endowed with divine protection that enhances the user's fighting ability. It also protects you from cold and heat.
